name: Dottie's Delights Gift Certificate
description:
Dottie's Delights Gift Certificate for the special lady in your life!

Choose from $50, $75, $100 or $200.  Feel free to mix and match amount options to customize your own personal gift selection, or just let us know if you have a specific gift certificate need and we will be in touch to take care of the rest! <3

name: Silk Tap Pant
description:
From the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection, this exquisite silk panty is just as comfortable as it is elegant! This style is available in two colors so you can mix and match with all of the pieces for our fall collecton!

Select from a lovely lipstick red 100% Italian silk with a 1960's menswear inspired sketchy, almost plaid style print OR a classic film noir black silk/cotton blend.  Either one is perfect for the ultimate in luxury sleepwear, lounging around the bedroom, or under your best skirts and dresses!

Each is cut on the bias with a soft elastic waistband and a handcut lace applique detail at your hip.

To care for your delicates, please handwash in lukewarm water with delicate detergents.  Lay flat to dry. Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Red: 100% silk
Black: 60% cotton, 40% silk

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Red Silk Low Rise Panty
description:
The classic panty to accompany the Red Silk pieces in the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection!

Made of the softest black microfiber with 100% Italian silk front panel, this pairs ideally with the garter belt and bullet bra for the total film noir femme fatale!

Front panel is decorated with a hand cut black lace applique detail to balance the touch of mid-century menswear in the hashed print to the silk.

Please allow 2-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Body: 92% nylon, 8% spandex
Front Panel: 100% silk
Gusset Lining: 100% cotton

Photo Credits: 

Photography: Antje Kastner 
Models: Mikaila Von Merr and Valencia Davis 
Hair: Antje Kastner 
Make Up: Jezabel Carolina Alvarez

name: Red Silk Garter Belt
description:
The perfect red lingerie piece for the film noir femme fatale plays with just a hint of that mid-century menswear influence in the hashed black print...we think it's a perfect balance.

Our newest garter belt is made of a double layer of 100% Italian silk with a large intricately hand cut black lace applique detail decorating your hip as you wiggle walk...

There is a secret inner layer for support and full silk lining so that this will feel heavenly against the body while still holding up all days and keeping your shape looking its best!

The garter belts are as durable as ever, they are workhorses that will hold up all day long and still make you look ravishing at the end of the night! ;)

These are meant to sit at your natural waist and nip in your waist just slightly.

6 garter straps of highest quality metal & canvas. Black satin elastic is adjustable with metal grips. Back hook and eye closure with three rows and just an smidgen of elastic for mobility.

Turnaround time is usually 2-6 weeks as they are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Main: 100% silk

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Antje Kastner
Models: Mikaila Von Merr and Valencia Davis
Hair: Antje Kastner
Make Up: Jezabel Carolina Alvarez

name: Red Silk Bra
description:
Introducing our new Red Silk Bra! This classic style is updated with the perfect classic red silk with a touch of 1960's menswear inspiration with the subtled hashed almost-plaid print.  The Red Silk Bra pairs well with several other pieces in the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection including the Red Silk Tap Pant, Red Silk Garter Belt or Red Silk Low Rise Panty!

Featuring our favorite black Chantilly lace on top and bias-cut 100% Italian silk on the bottom of the cup to create a subtle vintage shape, this bra gives a wink to the classic femme fatale.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Base: 100% silk
Lace: 100% polyester
Back: 90% nylon, 10% spandex

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Gold Lace Girdle Skirt
description:
The new Gold Lace Girdle Skirt is a perfect, festive addition to your special occasion lingerie collection! Make yourself sparkle from the inside at your next holiday party! ;)

This luxurious new girdle features six panels and a higher waist with a thick 2" elastic for the ultimate in shapewear control to keep the tummy in check and smooth out your hips and thighs in perfect vintage fashion!  

Our most sumptuous fabrics yet, with an exquisite metallic gold lace overlay on true antique champagne stretch satin, a traditional mid-century girdle fabric than is no longer in production.  

We use 6 garter clips to secure your stockings, as sturdy as the original deal: metal hooks with a canvas and rubber stopper.  

Please allow 2-6 weeks for delivery, these sweethearts are handmade to order! If you have a rush order, please email info@dottiesdelights.com and we will do our best to accommodate you! <3

Main Body: 90% nylon, 10% elastane
Lace: 56% rayon, 25% nylon, 19% polyester

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Gold Lace Bra
description:
The new Gold Lace Bra from the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection will make your holidays sparkle! A perfect special occasion bra.  

Incredibly detailed, luxurious gold lace is layered over a stretch satin champagne and paired with a black cotton/silk blend on bottom for a fancy and festive look. The cup is a mild vintage "bullet bra" shape with lots of support that easily translates between modern and period attire. 

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Main Body: 60% cotton, 40% silk
Lace: 56% rayon, 25% nylon, 19% polyester
Mesh: 90% nylon, 10% spandex

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Ribbon Zig Zag Low Rise Panty
description:
Sexy and burlesque inspired, this is one versatile panty! They can be paired with either Ribbon Lace or Zig Zag pieces from the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection!  

The front features a black ribbon lace over solid black silk/cotton blend and a peek-a-boo zig zag mesh on the back. 

Please allow 3-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Back: 79% nylon, 21% lycra
Front Panel Solid: 60% cotton, 40% silk
Lace: 100% polyester
Gusset Lining: 100% cotton


Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Ribbon Lace Waist Cincher
description:
Fun fact: corsetry was my first love, and I am thrilled to announce the inclusion of a waist cincher in the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection!

The Ribbon Lace Waist Cincher is a delicate and sheer piece as well as a fully functional fashion cincher.  It offers true waist reduction of roughly 2-5 inches with spiral steel boning, front busk and sturdy lacing grommets.

Sizing is based on your corset size, not true waist measurement.  If you are unsure or unfamiliar with corset sizing, please contact me for help! 

Please allow 3-6 weeks for delivery, these pieces are handmade to order! If you have a rush request, please email info@dottiesdelights.com and we will do our best to accommodate you! <3

Lace: 100% polyester
Lining: 100% nylon

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Ribbon Lace Bra
description:
The new Ribbon Lace Bra from the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection is a rope bondage inspired piece.  Our edgiest bra yet!

Featuring a ribbon lace structure over a sheer peek-a-boo base, the Ribbon Lace Bra will give you a subtle vintage shape and a hint of vintage erotica.  

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Lace: 100% polyester
Lining: 100% nylon
Back: 90% nylon, 10% spandex

Photo Credits: 
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Fredy Anaya 
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Zig Zag High Waist Knickers
description:
Film noir inspired knickers for the mysterious woman!  

Peek-a-boo zig zag mesh and a solid black front panel with a polka dot mesh overlay.  Finished with a black ruffle trim on each leg opening. 

This high waisted option features a 2" thick black plush elastic waistband which offers great support for your hourglass figure!

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. Please contact us for more information.

Body: 95% nylon, 5% lycra
Front panel solid: 92%, 8% spandex
Front panel mesh: 100% nylon


Photo Credits:
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Fredy Anaya
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Zig Zag Bra
description:
Inspired by the fetish illustrations of John Wille from the '40s & '50s, we bring you the Zig Zag Bra from the Sweet Gwendolyn Collection!

Featuring a sheer peek-a-boo mesh on the top and bias-cut silk on the bottom of the cup to create a subtle vintage shape, this bra gives a wink to Bettie Page and film noir.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Main body: 100%silk
Top panel: 95% nylon, 5% lycra
Back: 90% nylon, 10% spandex

Photo Credits:
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Fredy Anaya
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Zig Zag Mosh Playsuit
description:
You loved the original Mosh Playsuit so much, it's back and we've decided to give it a make-over for Fall! 

Originally designed in collaboration with our favorite alternative pin-up model, Miss Mosh (www.themoshroom.com), this fun little romper is sexy and playful with a nod to the great pin-up artist Alberto Vargas.    

Features a removable double ribbon halter tie, deep V low cut back and ruffle trim leg openings. Sheer black mesh with a figure-flattering vertical zig zag design is very comfortable and stretchy, although it offers a little more control to the stretch than the original. 95% nylon, 5% lycra, exclusive of elastics and trim.


The Zig Zag Playsuit is in stock and ready to ship! <3

**General Sizing Info!**
If you would like additional assistance in size recommendation, just send us an email.

XS: 22-24" waist / 32-34" hip 
S: 24-26" waist / 34-36" hip 
M: 26-28" waist / 36-38" hip 
L: 28-30" waist / 38-40" hip 
XL: 30-32" waist / 40-42" hip 
1X: 32-34" waist / 42-44" hip 
2X: 34-36" waist / 44-46" hip

The bust is open and flexible, it was fit on both a B and DD cup.


Photo Credits:
Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Carly Russ of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Fredy Anaya
Styling: Stephanie Foley

name: Sweet Pins Bow Seamed Stockings
description: We're so excited to support one of our stockist by now carrying their house brand seamed stockings! Thank you Sweet Pins! Ultra sheer stockings with a contrasting reinforced foot and welt and a contrasting retro Cuban heel to elongate the leg. The sexy back seam is adorned with a little bow that sits on the back of the thigh, adding a feminine and flirty touch. The back seam is added to the stocking by the same machine while it is knitted - this ensures that the seam is perfectly neat and slightly raised, just like genuine fully fashioned stockings. This method requires specific machines and longer production times, but we believe it is a luxurious touch that sets our product apart from many others. Designed in Australia and manufactured in Italy and now sold in the US! Yarn: 90% Nylon, 10% Elastane Denier: 20

name: Bubblemints High Waist Knickers
description:
This sweet confection is the perfect mid-century silk luxury!

Hand-dyed stretch silk body in a subtle peachy-pink that is just sheer enough!  Front panel is silk mint with a sheer pink silk chiffon polka dot overlay.  (ooh la la!)

This high option features a 2" thick vanilla plush elastic waistband which offers great support for your hourglass figure!

Scalloped plush elastic in vanilla peeks out at the leg.  Cotton/bamboo gusset with special wicking properties.

Please allow 3-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Bubblemints Low Rise Knickers
description:
This sweet confection is the perfect mid-century silk luxury!

Hand-dyed stretch silk body in a subtle peachy-pink that is just sheer enough!  Front panel is silk mint with a sheer pink silk chiffon polka dot overlay.  (ooh la la!)

Scalloped plush elastic in vanilla peeks out at the leg and waist.  Cotton/bamboo gusset with special wicking properties.

Please allow 2-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Bubblemints Polka Dot Garter Belt
description:
This sweet confection is the perfect mid-century luxury! Body is 100% pure silk in peach and mint colorblocking with a light bubblegum pink polka dot sheer silk chiffon overlay.

There is a secret inner layer for support and full silk lining so that this will feel heavenly against the body while still holding up all days and keeping your shape looking its best!

The garter belts are as durable as ever, they are workhorses that will hold up all day long and still make you look ravishing at the end of the night! ;)

These are meant to sit at your natural waist and nip in your waist just slightly.

6 garter straps of highest quality metal & canvas. Pink satin elastic is adjustable with metal grips. Back hook and eye closure with three rows and just an smidgen of elastic for mobility.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti 
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago 
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle 
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Pink Bubblemints Bra
description:
This sweet confection is the perfect mid-century luxury!  Body is 100% pure silk in peach and mint with a light bubblegum pink polka dot sheer silk chiffon overlay.  

Pink powernet back band of 90% nylon, 10% elastane.  Vanilla scalloped plush back elastic decorates the edges with pink satin elastic straps and pink adjustable hook and eye back closure.  A complete dessert for the body!

The cup is a mild vintage "bullet bra" shape with lots of support that easily translates between modern and period attire.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks construction time as these are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Andi Low Rise Panty
description:
A delightfully bold colorblocking set in black and mint!

This piece mixes the fun of 1960's pop art with Art Deco stitching references in a heavenly soft and easy to wear low rise panty.

Front panel is a double layer of pure silk with a thin inner lining of nylon.  Contrasting cream scalloped elastic for the waist and leg.  The main body is a delicious microfiber that feels almost like silk as well but with plenty of stretch...a complete joy to wear!

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can do sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Andi Mint Garter Belt
description:
A delightfully bold colorblocking set in black and mint made of pure silk! 

We've mixed inspiration from the pop art of the 1960's with Art Deco stitching details in a mid-century silhouette.  

Body is made of 100% silk and fully lined with a thin inner layer of nylon for support.  Feels just heavenly against the skin!

Keeps your stockings secure and in place all day (and night!) long with 6 garter straps of highest quality metal & canvas.  Elastic is adjustable with metal grips.  Back hook and eye closure with three rows and just an smidgen of elastic for mobility.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks as they are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Andi Mint Bra
description:
A delightfully bold colorblocking set in black and mint made of pure silk! 

We've mixed inspiration from the pop art of the 1960's with Art Deco stitching details in a 1950's bullet bra reference.  

Contrast stitching in cream to coordinate with the scalloped elastic trim.  Body is made of 100% silk and fully lined with a sturdy powernet band of 90% nylon and 10% elastane.  Feels just heavenly against the skin!

The cup is a mild vintage shape with lots of support that easily translates between modern and period attire.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order, may occasionally be longer. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Good N Plenty Bra
description:
A colorful poppy new take on our Bricolage ribbon bra!  

This fun twist in multi-tonal pinks has a lot going on!  High on the silk content, mixed with polka dot mesh, authentic vintage satin, and a black contrast ribbon stitched into a bow! This is my homage to a construction technique from bras in the 40s and 50s that actually seamed a bow shape onto the center front to shape the cups.

The shape of this bra is a modified bullet bra, most reminiscent of the 1960's silhouette....pointy, but not *too* pointy and easy to work with both vintage and modern outfits alike!  

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries. We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order. Please contact us for more information.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Good N Plenty Low Rise Panty
description:
A playfully romantic little panty that's both comfortable and attractive!  

Made of a brightly colored pink stretch silk with a striking black satin contrast ribbon trim and front panel of silk with polka dot mesh overlay!  One of our highest silk content knickers yet!

Subtle scalloped black elastic at waist and legs. Simply a joy to wear!

Please allow 2-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Photo credits:

Photography: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jamie Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Good N Plenty Girdle Skirt
description:
Bring a pop of color to your vintage style shapewear!

This fun little girdle skirt is the perfect thing to keep you in check when you want to look your best.  We've made some little improvements with this latest girdle offering.  A thicker 2" elastic waistband will offer better support and really nips in that hourglass figure, plus it will also sit just a little higher on your body, which is actually more flattering!

The front diamond is lined in a peachy-pink silk with pink polka dot mesh, all serving the purpose of keeping your stomach lying smoother in those tight fitting pencil skirts and wiggle dresses.

But my favorite part is the vintage deadstock satin fabric in back in a gorgeous shot of pink to pop from behind!  This is the same material used in foundations from the mid century, the factory that produced this fabric is no longer in business and once it's gone, that's it!  

We use 6 garter clips to secure your stockings, as sturdy as the original deal: metal hooks with a canvas and rubber stopper.  We've even updated our supply to be sturdier than our originals!  <3

Please allow 2-6 weeks for delivery, these puppies are handmade to order! If you have a rush order, please email info@dottiesdelights.com and we will do our best to accommodate you! <3

Photo credits:

Photographer: Kimberly Capriotti
Model: Ashley Simone of Ford Chicago
Hair: Jaime Lynn Sterle
Make Up: Andrea C. Samuels

name: Bricolage Long Line Black Lace Bra
description:
We are so excited to finally present the newest style to our Bricolage collection!  This elegant longline softcup bra is a gussied up version of a 1947 foundation staple with a few key features of improvement and luxury.

The non-underwire cups have a sheer lining for support and shaping with an exquisite black Chantilly lace overlay.  The scalloped eyelash edging decorates your decolletage in almost a bodice or camisole manner.  Black silk front with decorative stitching details.  Heavy weight powernet backing offers plenty of support and finishes in back with 6 hook and eye closures in 3 rows for adjustability.

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order. Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.  We are starting with a small size run, but please email if you fall outside of this range.  We may still be able to accommodate you. A small one-time patterning fee on your first order may apply. Please contact us for more information.

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh

name: Bricolage Black Lace Ribbon Bra
description:
Our favorite piece from the Bricolage collection!  This very special black lace bra features Chantilly lace with a structured sheer nylon lining, giving you plenty of support in a modified, subtle vintage bullet bra way.  The scalloped eyelash edge lays on your decolletage demurely, and would look lovely peeking out of a low cut top.  

A ribbon bow detail is stitched into the center of the bra as an homage to the construction of bras in the 40s and 50s with a ribbon material and technique found in popular fashion of the 1930's.  

Turnaround time is usually 3-6 weeks on this piece as they are handmade to order.  Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.  We can usually do bra sizes falling outside of the standard range, it may require a small one-time patterning fee on your first order.  Please contact us for more information.

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh.

name: Bricolage Black Lace Garter Belt
description:
From our Bricolage collection, this little darling is dying to become your new wardrobe staple!  New for fall/winter 2012, we have made some improvements to our garter belt offerings:  the front panel garter clips have been slightly widened to sit more central on your legs, we have changed our actual garter clips to a more secure version (while still being true to our vintage aesthetic & function -- they are still metal with a rubber knob and canvas backing!), and we have added just a bit of elastic to the back closure so our sizes should be more accurate and more comfortable!

The garter belts are as durable as ever, they are workhorses that will hold up all day long and still make you look ravishing at the end of the night!  ;)

Sheer stable nylon backing with a classic black chantilly lace throughout.  Black cotton bias trim binding and six suspender grips with metal adjusters.  hook and eye back closure.

We have a few pieces of these in stock, so turnaround time may be anywhere from immediate shipping up to 6 weeks.  For rush requests or custom inquiries, please contact us.  Made in Chicago, IL USA.

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh.

name: Bricolage Black Knickers
description:
From our Bricolage collection, this low rise vintage style panty is extra soft and delightful against the skin.  Chantilly lace front panel with champagne colored silk lining and a body of black microfiber with plenty of stretch.  Subtle scalloped elastic at waist and legs.  Simply a joy to wear!

Please allow 2-6 weeks turnaround time, as these are handmade to order.  Please contact us for rush requests or custom inquiries.

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh.

name: Bricolage Champagne Lace Bra
description:
From our Bricolage collection, this is anything but your plain nude bra!  Covered in a beautiful beige lace with a eyelash scalloped edge to just barely graze your decolletage.  Fully lined with a vintage appropriate sheer nylon, this has a modified bullet bra shape, so it is subtle enough to wear with modern or vintage clothing.  Antique satin back band also has the lace overlay. 

Please allow 2-6 weeks for delivery time, as these beauties are handmade to order. Contact us for rush requests.

We can also do sizes outside of the standard range, which may require a small patterning fee on your first purchase items.  Again, contact us via the link on this page.

name: Bricolage Champagne Lace Tap Pants
description:
From our Bricolage collection, this exquisite high waist panty is just as comfortable as it is luxurious!  A lovely, intricate late throughout with a fair amount of stretch.  Eyelash scalloped bottom edge almost gives a skirt-like appearance.  Doubled faced silk gusset panel between the legs and elastic waist. 

100% silk gusset
100% polyester lace body

Handwash cold, please.  Lay flat to dry.  Please allow 2-6 weeks for turnaround time as this piece is handmade to order.  For rush requests, please contact us.  Made in Chicago, IL USA

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh.

name: Long Sheer Dressing Robe
description:
Straight out of your vintage Hollywood dreams, we present to you our pinnacle of boudoir drama!  This long sheer nylon dressing robe has a small pool of a train with ruffles winding up the hem, gradually growing at center back.  Ruffles also adorn the short angel sleeves, and satin ribbon closes at the neck with a ruffled wide neckline. The perfect piece for your boudoir, photo shoot, or just to glamourize lazy Saturday afternoon! <3

New sizing! Robes now come in 2 sizing options -- size 1 will fit your smaller frame ladies and size 2 is for the plus size and broad shouldered clientele. While the piece is very open and flexible, I would recommend size 1 for XS-L and size 2 for XL-3X, roughy speaking!

Made of 100% nylon. Available in pink or black.  Please contact us if you need a custom request.  We are doing a VERY limited run of these, so act fast.  Turnaround time may be anywhere from 2-6 weeks depending on queue. Made in Chicago, IL USA.

Photography by Jane J. Gaspar, model is Mosh.

name: Short Sheer Frou Frou Dressing Robe
description:
Straight out of your vintage Hollywood dreams, we present to you our frothy nylon dressing robe in all of its sheer, ruffle-y splendor!  Ruffles wind around the hem and short angel sleeves, and satin ribbon closure at the ruffled wide neckline.  Available in pink or black.  The perfect piece for your boudoir, photo shoot, or just to glamourize  lazy Saturday afternoon!  <3

New sizing!  Robes now come in 2 sizing options -- size 1 will fit your smaller frame ladies and size 2 is for the plus size and broad shouldered clientele.  While the piece is very open and flexible, I would recommend size 1 for XS-L and size 2 for XL-3X, roughy speaking!  

Made of 100% nylon.  Please contact us if you need a custom request.  We are keeping a few of these in stock, so turnaround time may be immediate up to 4 weeks.  Made in Chicago, IL USA.  

Photo credits:
1: Lady Damona Art, Model: Acid Doll
2. Kimberly Capriotti Model: Carly Russ
3. Shot by Faire Frou Frou in their Los Angeles boutique
4. Todd Crawford, Model: Mosh
5. Lady Damona Art, Model: Acid Doll

name: Garden Party Knickers
description:
From the Magic Garden collection, a super fun colorway in our most luxurious materials yet!

name: Exclusive Mosh Playsuit
description:
By popular demand!

This fiesty little romper was first dreamed up by our feature model and burlesque performer, Mosh (www.themoshroom.com) and shot by the renowned photographer Viva Van Story.  This photoset was such a hit and after many inquires on the wardrobe, we are now offering a limited release of the sheer play suit exclusively through our site in collaboration with Mosh!  

Features a removable double ribbon halter tie (photo shown without, but may require double sided tape for this fantasy look), deep V low cut back, little black buttons on the sides of the hip, and ruffle trim leg openings.  Completely sheer black mesh fabric is very comfortable and stretchy.   79% nylon, 21% lycra, exclusive of elastics and trim.

A perfect piece to conjure up images of the golden era of pin-up artwork for photoshoots, performances or just to frolic around the bedroom!  

We have limited quantities in stock, some pieces may be made to order.  Please allow up to 4 weeks for your item to be constructed and shipped to you.  If you need a rush order, or have any questions please email info@dottiesdelights.com  <3

photo credits:
model: Mosh
photographer: Viva Van Story
hair: Pin Me Up Hair

**Sizing Info!**

My biggest recommendation, is if you are on the fence between sizes, is to go with the smaller option. This piece has quite a bit of stretch and is very accommodating.

Having said that, my general size range is based on:

XS: 22-24" waist / 32-34" hip
S: 24-26" waist / 34-36" hip
M: 26-28" waist / 36-38" hip
L: 28-30" waist / 38-40" hip
XL: 30-32" waist / 40-42" hip
1X: 32-34" waist / 42-44" hip
2X: 34-36" waist / 44-46" hip

The bust is open and flexible, it was fit on both a B and DD cup.

Hope this helps! If anyone has any additional questions or would like a personal recommendation, please don't hesitate to send a message through the sidebar contact link! ♥

name: Lily Nude Knickers
description:
On sale!  Originally $60.  Ships free with any other purchase.

Bringing back the naughty to high waisted panties! These pink tinted sheer little darlings are the best of all worlds: moderate coverage while still being versatile and sexy! Fully sheer with dainty little lace trim in front and ruffle elastic trim at leg openings. These tend to sit just below the waist and cut ever so slightly across the butt, kicking up the sexy factor just enough.

Made to replicate the dainty vintage knickers that are so hard to find nowadays, these are made out of 100% nylon and will snag if you are not extra careful with them! So please, for heaven's sake, hand wash these and keep them for special occasions when you want to look your friskiest!

100% cotton gusset lining. Handmade in Chicago, IL!

name: Lily Nude Girdle Skirt
description:
ON SALE!  Org. $125.  

Vintage style open-bottom girdle skirt, perfect for that special occassion when you want to look and feel your best! This amazing shapewear is made out of the finest heavy-duty powernet material, so it really is as functional as it is beautiful! Blush satin control panel for your tummy with fine Chantilly lace overlay plus champagne hued heavy antique satin back panel for extra butt-enhancement and modesty! 6 high-quality metal/canvas/rubber garter clips with ribbon and lace overlay.  

Please note, this nude colorway is just a little bit lighter weight than the black or white varieties, making this the perfect everyday shaper piece!

Girdle skirts are made to be worn at your natural waist, in order to maximize the hourglass figure you are trying to create! All items must be handwashed, please. Body is 90% nylon, 10% spandex. Front panel: 53% nylon, 33% polyester, 13% rayon. Exclusive of decoration and elastics. Handmade in Chicago, IL.

This item is available in black, white or nude colorways.

name: Lily BP Garter Belt
description: ON SALE! Org. $125. This vintage style 6-point garter belt is a workhorse that will last a full active day and still keep the bedroom hot at night!
